articles.description: Fans were livid.
articles.content:
Chinas three top streaming platforms took out appearances from Lady Gaga, Justin Bieber and LGBTQ fans from HBOs much-anticipated Friends: The Reunion, infuriating fans. 
Also cut from the program t… [+1923 chars]

articles.author: Cynthia Littleton
articles.title: Ed Asner Hails ‘Mary Tyler Moore Show’ Co-Star Gavin MacLeod: ‘He Made Everything Easy’ - Variety
articles.description: Gavin MacLeod was a versatile and dependable actor who was a good friend to his co-stars during the seven-season run of “The Mary Tyler Moore Show,” Ed Asner told Variety in paying tribute to the TV veteran who died Saturday at the age of 90. MacLeod was an a…
